books.title: Oh Great I was reincarnated as a farmer!
books.author: Benjamin Kerei
books.description: A guy is reincarnated as a farmer and he can only level up through farming, but he tries to use monster killing as an exploit

books.title: The Retired S Ranked Adventurer
books.author: Wolfe and Falcon
books.description: A retiried expert adventurer, loses his memory and wants to retire and open a pub

books.title: Alpha Physics: Wagga
books.author: Alex Kozolowski
books.description: Human's discover an alpha particle that changes the physics of earth, now it's like a video game with different laws of physics. MC's name is Adrian, worked building a solar Plant in Austrailia, now with the help of his interface he has magic and assassin type powers.

books.title: Age of Stone
books.author: Jez Cajiao
books.description: Aliens send dugeons to Earth to help prepare humans for an alien Invasion, the MC captures a dugeon on accient and become the dugeon master more or less and is using it to make a safe place for him and his friends.

books.title: The Good Guys
books.author: Eric Ugland
books.description: The MC is transported to a new land, and then made a Duke of some land, the Emperor dies and the realm is in Chaos, the MC is super strong and has crazy regenative powers, but he doesn't have much in the way of planning or magic.

books.title: He Who Fights With Monsters
books.author: Shirtaloon
books.description: The MC is teleported to a new dimension and is given a gaming interface to help him cope with this rude transportation.  Jason has assassins/shadow type powers.

books.title: The Mayor of Noobtown
books.author: Ryan Rimmel
books.description: The MC is teleported by a Demon to a place where everyone has screens like a litrpg, the MC become mayor of NoobTown he has a demon to help him along with a badger to fight the evil Charles!

books.title: The Completionist Chronicles
books.author: Dakota Krout
books.description: The MC along with the rest of the world is sent to a new dimension where they have to fight, the MC just conqured the elves volcano base.  The MC is a ritualist, he can make crazy rituals to build buildings and things.

books.title: The Cradle Series
books.author: Will Wight
books.description: The MC is a boy who has grown strong and continues to grow stronger.

books.title: The Watcher:A litrpg saga
books.author: Sean Oswald
books.description: The MC family, Dave, Emily, ect, they are a family that got sent to another universe where only the strong survive, Emily has become a duchess for the elves and Dave a duke for the humans, but there is a dark power that threatens the existence of everyone.
